messages.subject: RE: [AlwaysLearning] Re: Cleaning
messages.messageBody:
<<<That's the thing that always irritated me about Bewitched. You've got
this
hot wife who can handle all the drudgery of life by twitching her nose in a
VERY
cute way. Why not handle the boring things that way so you have more time to

enjoy the hot wife?>>>

Oh you said it!! It infuriates me that Darren wants Samantha to deny and
renounce that which is the very foundation of her personhood, her greatest
talent for the sake of trivia. Then to top it off he tries his darnedest to
suppress it in Tabitha, incidentally expecting her to deny half of her
heritage. And Samantha colludes with him in that latter horror. I'm with
Endora - Derwood is an ass.

Robyn L. Coburn


---

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: Cleaning
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/25/04 11:46:13 AM, sylgt04@yahoo.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/25/04 11:46:13 AM, sylgt04@... writes:

<< Because at that time in TVLand, a peck on the cheek was all the enjoyment
a guy could have with his hot wife. >>

So she SHOULD spend all day cooking (badly) and cleaning the house?

I think it was just part of the post-wwII push to get women happily into
suburbia, leaving jobs open for the returning GIs. That propaganda movement went
on through the 50's and 60's.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: Cleaning
messages.msgSnippet: Because at that time in TVLand, a peck on the cheek was all the enjoyment a guy could have with his hot wife. Syl ***** That s the thing that always irritated
messages.messageBody:
Because at that time in TVLand, a peck on the cheek was all the enjoyment a guy could have with his hot wife.

Syl


*****

That's the thing that always irritated me about Bewitched. You've got this hot wife who can handle all the drudgery of life by twitching her nose in a VERY cute way. Why not handle the boring things that way so you have more time to enjoy the hot wife?

messages.subject: Re: Cleaning
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/25/2004 11:10:26 AM Eastern Standard Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes: I want to be able to clean much faster, maybe magically
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/25/2004 11:10:26 AM Eastern Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

I want to be able to clean much faster, maybe magically like Mary Poppins and
Mrs. Weasley. <g>
******************
That's the thing that always irritated me about Bewitched. You've got this
hot wife who can handle all the drudgery of life by twitching her nose in a VERY
cute way. Why not handle the boring things that way so you have more time to
enjoy the hot wife?

Kathryn
